entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 9.0 API Reviews #33220
    9.0.0
  • Why does migration need singleton lifetime when AddDbContext and AddHostedService exist in ConfigurationServices? #33219
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore 8.0.2: Inferring type mapping based on operand size has caused regression for the Oracle EF core provider #33218
  • How to include children on another children condition #33217
  • KeyNotFoundException during ApplyProjection phase of a groupby query with FirstOrDefault #33216
  • We don't know how to bind property to OPENJSON subquery in some scenarios #33215
  • LINQ query is failing in VB.NET same query works with same EF in C# #33214

Closed

  • How does translation of comparison operators work for converted values? #33208
  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of Type "". In .Net 8 with EF Core 8 #33187
  • RelationalDbContextOptionsBuilder.CommandTimeout should accept zero as a valid value #33196
    9.0.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • API review changes #33221
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32911 - Incorrect apply projection for complex properties #33212
  • [release/8.0] Reduce memory usage during relationship cycle detection by keeping track of visited properties whenever there are FK forks #33211
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • Fix inferred mapping application on Sqlite JsonEachExpression #33209
  • Another tiny fix to #32911 #33213
  • 33196 command timeout allow zero #33198
    community-contribution

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query (#32978) #33027
    Servicing-consider
